title: Folder
description: This schema defines the Folder entity. A Folder is a collection of Files. A StoreService can contain multiple Folders. A Folder is to a StoreService what a Database is for a DatabaseService. An S3 path containing some files is a Folder

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this folder instance.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Name that uniquely identifies a folder in the format 'ServiceName.FolderName'.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this folder.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

service.description: Link to the store service where this folder is hosted in.

serviceType.description: Service type where this folder is hosted in.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this folder.

files.description: References to Files in the folder.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
